identity.name: TaskFlow
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix productivity with architectural precision
Emotion First: Calmness and clarity above all
Content is King: Data must be legible and beautiful
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 border-b border-white/20 (Use for sticky headers)
visual_enhancers.noise: Use a subtle noise texture on the sidebar background for depth
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero sections only.

login_background.alt: Abstract stone texture with soft shadows
login_background.usage: Full screen background for Login/Register pages with overlay

user_avatar.usage: Default user profile picture in dashboard

empty_state.usage: Empty state for boards or tasks

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update `index.css` to import Manrope and Public Sans fonts. Set them as CSS variables.
2. THEME: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the provided color palette. Ensure 'background' is set to the off-white stone color.
3. LAYOUT: Build a responsive SidebarLayout component. It should be persistent on desktop and a drawer on mobile.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove excessive rounded corners (stick to rounded-md or rounded-lg). Increase padding in Cards.
5. PAGES: Create 'Dashboard', 'BoardDetail', 'Login', 'Register'. Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.
6. AUTH: Implement the Login/Register pages with the provided 'login_background' image on one side (split layout) or as a subtle background.
7. TASKS: Use a 'Kanban' style or 'List' style for tasks. Ensure priority tags have distinct colors (Low: Slate, Medium: Blue, High: Terracotta).
8. TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
9. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx extensions as per the project structure. Do not use .ts/.tsx.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered text everywhere.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to everything clickable.
Spacing: When in doubt, add more padding.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible against the stone background.
No Emojis: Use Lucide icons instead of emojis for UI elements.
